00010 PulseCandidateFinder::PulseCandidateFinder(modules::options* opts) {
00011 
00012   // Set all the rise parameter values
00013   fRiseValues[IDs::kMuSc] = opts->GetInt("muSc", 300);

00021   fRiseValues[IDs::kScGe] = opts->GetInt("ScGe", 20);

00023 
00024   fRiseValues[IDs::kSiL2] = opts->GetInt("SiL2-F", 80);
00025   fRiseValues[IDs::kSiL1_1] = opts->GetInt("SiL1-1-F", 40);
00026   fRiseValues[IDs::kSiL1_2] = opts->GetInt("SiL1-2-F", 20);
00027   fRiseValues[IDs::kSiL1_3] = opts->GetInt("SiL1-3-F", 20);
00028   fRiseValues[IDs::kSiL1_4] = opts->GetInt("SiL1-4-F", 80);
00029 
00030   fRiseValues[IDs::kSiR2] = opts->GetInt("SiR2-F", 20);
00031   fRiseValues[IDs::kSiR1_1] = opts->GetInt("SiR1-1-F", 40);
00032   fRiseValues[IDs::kSiR1_2] = opts->GetInt("SiR1-2-F", 60);
00033   fRiseValues[IDs::kSiR1_3] = opts->GetInt("SiR1-3-F", 80);

00035 
00036   // Set all the threshold parameter values
00037   fThresholdValues[IDs::kGe] = opts->GetInt("Ge-S", 500);
00038

00040   fThresholdValues[IDs::kSiL1_1] = opts->GetInt("SiL1-1-S", 20);
00041   fThresholdValues[IDs::kSiL1_2] = opts->GetInt("SiL1-2-S", 150);
00042   fThresholdValues[IDs::kSiL1_3] = opts->GetInt("SiL1-3-S", 20);
00043   fThresholdValues[IDs::kSiL1_4] = opts->GetInt("SiL1-4-S", 40);
00044 
00045   fThresholdValues[IDs::kSiR2] = opts->GetInt("SiR2-S", 50);
00046   fThresholdValues[IDs::kSiR1_1] = opts->GetInt("SiR1-1-S", 50);

00048   fThresholdValues[IDs::kSiR1_3] = opts->GetInt("SiR1-3-S", 40);
00049   fThresholdValues[IDs::kSiR1_4] = opts->GetInt("SiR1-4-S", 40);
00050 
00051   if (opts->HasOption("debug") && (opts->GetOption("debug").empty() || opts->GetBool("debug"))) {
00052     std::cout << "Parameter Values for PulseCandidateFinder" << std::endl; // would be nice to know which module this is for
00053     for (int iDet = IDs::kGe; iDet != IDs::kMuScA; ++iDet) {
00054       std::cout << IDs::channel::GetDetectorString(static_cast<IDs::Detector_t>(iDet)) << std::endl;
00055       std::cout << "\tThreshold = " << fThresholdValues[iDet] << std::endl;
00056       std::cout << "\tRise = " << fRiseValues[iDet] << std::endl;
00057     }
00058   }

00060 
00063 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindPulseCandidates(TPulseIsland* pulse) {
00064 
00065   // Clear the vector of pulse candidate locations first since it will still contain them from previous pulses
00066   fPulseCandidateLocations.clear();
00067 
00068   fPulseIsland = pulse;
00069   std::string detname = TSetupData::Instance()->GetDetectorName(fPulseIsland->GetBankName());
00070   IDs::channel theChannel = detname;
00071 
00072   // We have a different algorithm for fast and slow pulses
00073   if (theChannel == IDs::Fast) {
00074 
00075     int rise = fRiseValues[theChannel.Detector()]; // the parameter for this algorithm
00076     if (rise == 0) {
00077       std::cout << "Error: PulseCandidateFinder currently does not have a rise parameter for " << detname << std::endl;
00078     }
00079     else {
00080       FindCandidatePulses_Fast(rise);
00081     }
00082   }
00083   else if (theChannel == IDs::Slow) {
00084 
00085     int threshold = fThresholdValues[theChannel.Detector()]; // the parameter for this algorithm
00086     if (threshold == 0) {
00087       std::cout << "Error: PulseCandidateFinder currently does not have a threshold parameter for " << detname << std::endl;
00088     }
00089     else {
00090       FindCandidatePulses_Slow(threshold);
00091     }
00092   }
00093 }

00095 PulseCandidateFinder::~PulseCandidateFinder() {
00096 }

00100 std::vector<TPulseIsland*> PulseCandidateFinder::GetPulseCandidates() {
00101 
00102   // Get the output ready
00103   std::vector<TPulseIsland*> pulse_candidates;
00104 
00105   // Loop through the pulse candidate locations
00106   for (std::vector<Location>::iterator locationIter = fPulseCandidateLocations.begin(); locationIter != fPulseCandidateLocations.end(); ++locationIter) {
00107     
00108     // Get the start and stop locations
00109     int start_location = (*locationIter).start;
00110     int stop_location = (*locationIter).stop;
00111 
00112     // Get the bank name and work out what the new timestamp will be
00113     std::string bankname = fPulseIsland->GetBankName();
00114     int new_timestamp = fPulseIsland->GetTimeStamp() + start_location;
00115 
00116     // Get the samples from the original TPI and have a new one ready for the pulse candidate
00117     const std::vector<int>& theSamples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00118     std::vector<int> theNewSamples;
00119 
00120     // Loop through the samples between the start and stop locations and add them to the new samples vector
00121     for (int iSample = start_location; iSample <= stop_location; ++iSample) {
00122       theNewSamples.push_back(theSamples.at(iSample));
00123     }
00124 
00125     TPulseIsland* pulse_island = new TPulseIsland(new_timestamp, theNewSamples, bankname);
00126     pulse_candidates.push_back(pulse_island);
00127   }
00128 
00129   return pulse_candidates;
00130 }
00131 
00134 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindCandidatePulses_Fast(int rise) {
00135 
00136   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00137   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00138   int pedestal = fPulseIsland->GetPedestal(0);
00139   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00140 
00141   int s1, s2, ds; // this sample value, the previous sample value and the change in the sample value
00142   bool found = false;
00143   Location location;
00144 
00145   // Loop through the samples
00146   for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00147     s1 = polarity * (samples[i-1] - pedestal);
00148     s2 = polarity * (samples[i] - pedestal);
00149     ds = s2 - s1;
00150 
00151     if (found) {
00152       if (s2 < 0) { // stop if the sample goes below pedestal
00153         location.stop = (int)i;
00154         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00155         found = false;
00156       }
00157     } else {
00158       if (ds > rise) {
00159         found = true;
00160         location.start = (int)(i - 1);
00161       }
00162     }
00163   }
00164 }
00165 
00168 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindCandidatePulses_Slow(int threshold) {
00169 
00170   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00171   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00172   int pedestal = fPulseIsland->GetPedestal(0);
00173   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00174 
00175   int sample_height; // the sample's height above pedestal
00176   int start, stop; // the start and stop location
00177   bool found = false;
00178   Location location;
00179 
00180   // Loop through the samples
00181   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00182     sample_height = polarity * (samples[i] - pedestal);
00183 
00184     if (found) {
00185       if (sample_height < 0) { // stop if the sample goes below pedestal
00186         location.stop = (int)i;
00187         start = stop = 0;
00188         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00189         found = false;
00190       }
00191     } else {
00192       if (sample_height > threshold) {
00193         found = true;
00194         location.start = (int)(i);
00195       }
00196     }
00197   }
00198 }

00203 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillParameterHistogram(TH1D* histogram) {
00204 
00205   std::string detname = TSetupData::Instance()->GetDetectorName(fPulseIsland->GetBankName());
00206   IDs::channel theChannel = detname;
00207 
00208   std::string parameter_name = "Unknown";
00209 
00210   // We have a different algorithm for fast and slow pulses
00211   if (theChannel == IDs::Fast) {
00212     parameter_name = "SampleDifference";
00213     FillSampleDifferencesHistogram(histogram);
00214   }
00215   else if (theChannel == IDs::Slow) {
00216     parameter_name = "SampleHeight";
00217     FillSampleHeightsHistogram(histogram);
00218   }
00219 
00220   std::string histtitle = "Plot of " + parameter_name + " for " + detname + " for Run 2808";
00221   histogram->SetTitle(histtitle.c_str());
00222   histogram->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("");
00223   histogram->GetXaxis()->SetTitle(parameter_name.c_str());
00224 }
00225 
00228 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillSampleDifferencesHistogram(TH1D* histogram) {
00229 
00230   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00231   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00232   int pedestal = fPulseIsland->GetPedestal(0);
00233   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00234 
00235   int s1, s2, ds; // this sample value, the previous sample value and the change in the sample value
00236 
00237   // Loop through the samples
00238   for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00239     s1 = polarity * (samples[i-1] - pedestal);
00240     s2 = polarity * (samples[i] - pedestal);
00241     ds = s2 - s1;
00242 
00243     histogram->Fill(ds);
00244   }
00245 }
00246 
00249 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillSampleHeightsHistogram(TH1D* histogram) {
00250 
00251   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00252   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00253   int pedestal = fPulseIsland->GetPedestal(0);
00254   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00255 
00256   int sample_height; // the height of this sample above pedestal
00257 
00258   // Loop through the samples
00259   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00260     sample_height = polarity * (samples[i] - pedestal);
00261 
00262     histogram->Fill(sample_height);
00263   }
00264 }
